attributes.review: This app is horrible do not download this app is terrible is the worst app I ever seen in my whole entire life don’t buy this decision oh my god this is all horrible horrible horrible horrible don’t buy this app!!!!🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤧🤮🤮🤢
attributes.title: Terrible worst horrible

attributes.review: The app has a lot of problems, the biggest being crashing my device after prolonged use, wouldn’t recommend it
attributes.title: Very glitchy app

attributes.review: i was at a birthday party and I opened the app and oranges started flying everywhere. It became a whole mess and I tried putting them back into to the phone but it didn’t work so now my friends birthday is RUINED. Thx a lot.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: i got this lovely looking app to support our magical president and i open it up and my whole phone disintegrated. i don’t know what sick kind of joke this is but i had to go buy a new phone just to write this review. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: i’m scared

attributes.review: I was super excited to finally get the app to support my president, but sadly it disappointed me there were many glitches and overall not what I expected.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what it had to offer and let me tell you just in few seconds that  I opened it I was disappointed and disgusted worst app ever. It also took for ever to download.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: Thanks for making my phone crash multiple times. The only reason I would recommend getting this app is so you can leave a bad review 🥰
attributes.title: Not a good app (or president)

attributes.review: I got the app to see political stuff and it was just terrible. Not even gonna lie, Trump has some awful views and I recommend you leave a negative review too if you feel the same way.
attributes.title: Terrible.

attributes.review: The worst app ever  not only is he trying to get rid of tik tok but that means there are going to be millions of people out of work tik tok stars get paid to do what they do so then your going to ha e millions out of work which is going to drop America’s gpa down !!!!!!!  Save tik tok
attributes.title: Save tik tok

attributes.review: I feel like a Karen right now but I’m here from tik tok soooo, anyways i mean just download it, and leave one star please, also it was the most embarrassing app I ever had I mean who wants a trump app like eewwwwww trash anyways THE APP SUCKED AND yeah yw, plz leave one star, thank u😌💅🏽👁👄👁✨🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: Disgusting
